short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that can help Hardly users track jobs more easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Hardly Chrome extension makes applying for jobs simpler. When you find a job posting on sites like LinkedIn or Indeed, you can use the extension to copy important details about the job and save them directly into Hardly’s job application tracker. This information is then used by Hardly’s tools to help you quickly create a resume and cover letter that match the job description, making your application stand out. It’s like having a digital assistant that keeps track of your job search and helps you apply faster and more effectively.

Go to https://app.hardly-work.com/register to make a free Hardly account and start tracking jobs today!

Here’s a step-by-step guide for using the Hardly Chrome extension to track job applications and optimize your resume and cover letter:

Step 1: Install the Hardly Chrome Extension
1. Go to the Hardly Chrome Extension page.
2. Click the “Add to Chrome” button, and confirm to install the extension.
3. Once installed, you’ll see the Hardly icon in your Chrome toolbar.

Step 2: Log In to Your Hardly Account
1. Click on the Hardly icon in the toolbar.
2. Log in with your Hardly account credentials to connect the extension to your Hardly job application tracker.

Step 3: Find a Job Posting
1. Browse job listings on sites like LinkedIn, Indeed, or any other job board.
2. When you find a job you’re interested in, click to view its details.

Step 4: Copy Job Information to Hardly
1. Click on the Hardly extension icon in your toolbar.
2. Use the extension’s “Copy Job Description” or “Save Job Details” options to automatically transfer key information about the job (title, company, job description) to your Hardly tracker.
3. Verify that the job details have been correctly saved to Hardly’s job application tracker.

Step 5: Customize Your Resume and Cover Letter
1. Open your Hardly dashboard by logging into the Hardly platform.
2. In the job application tracker, locate the job you saved.
3. Use Hardly’s AI-powered resume and cover letter tools to create customized versions that match the job description.
4. Download or save the customized documents for submitting with your application.

Step 6: Apply with Confidence
1. With your job-specific resume and cover letter ready, go back to the job posting site.
2. Submit your application, knowing that your documents are optimized for the position.
3. Using these steps, you can quickly organize your job search, keep track of opportunities, and apply with resumes and cover letters that are tailored for each role.
